name: SAM indev
description:
SAM stands for shooter airplanes multiplayer. It was originally MAS but SAM sounds cooler, and before that it was POWM for planes open world multiplayer.

Game  features:

  • Flight
  • Multiplayer
  • Shooting
  • Open World
  • Sounds
  • DEATH
  • Chat

Things that might be added:

  • Game modes like tdm, ffa, or bombing
  • Ability to add a size limit to the map
  • New aircraft
  • Aircraft upgrade system
  • Gun upgrade system
  • Money system (No P2W)
  • Upgraded GUI
  • Better servers

Sometimes the servers can be overloaded because it only runs on 20ccu with photon. Donations can help pay for more ccu and thus bigger servers
